LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumCooler_I.label: Quantum Prototype
LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumCooler_I.description: Required to unlock the Prototype Quantum Cooler. Could it really be possible?
LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumCooler_II.label: Quantum Cooling
LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumCooler_II.description: Required to unlock the Quantum Cooler. Research Quantum Mechanics in hopes of finding a way to reduce entropy without displacing it.
LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumHeater_II.label: Quantum Heating
LanguageData.QC_Research_QuantumHeater_II.description: Required to unlock the Quantum Heater. Research Quantum Mechanics in hopes of finding a more compact heating element.
